name: Paranoid Escape
description:
Warning! This game has a bug so it freezes after tutorial or after start. I tried to submit a fix in the grace period, but the chat bugged out. You can play a working version here: https://agrerim.itch.io/paranoid-escape2  for fun but voting for the game jam should, unfortunately, be done for this very incomplete version.

"It's a conspiracy which put you here in the first place. Surely they can read your mind..."

Paranoid Escape is a top-down stealth game where you try to escape a mental hospital. The twist is you get more insane for each level and start imagining compulsions, restrictions, and hallucinations.

Paranoid Escape was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme "It is not real". Due to time constraints there is a very limited number of "Paranoia Cards", but it's a prototype.

Created by Rasmus and Per using Unity Engine. Music from Mega Game Music Collection and also using OdinInspector, Behaviour Designer, Ootii Event System Dispatcher, ConsolePro, DOTween, Universal Sound FX and Ferr Supe cuber.
